channel.title: Flickr on David Calhoun's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Flickr on David Calhoun's blog

item.title: A Visit From Flickr!
item.description:
One of the best perks of working at Yahoo! is getting to attend first-class talks, especially when the talk is by one of your favorite groups. In this case, Flickr!

Flickr schwag: lens cleaner, phone cleaner, or iPhone 4 reception-enabler?

â€¦and it helps if one of the speakers was once a member of your team (Markus was in Yahoo! Mobile until recently).
